changes.description: Service description changed from web development to full-stack development
TypeScript specification added to frontend requirements
Node.js specification added to backend requirements
Testing description enhanced from basic to comprehensive
Post-launch support period added to scope
Total payment amount increased from $5,000 to $7,500
Payment structure changed from 2 to 3 installments with different percentages
changes.old_snippet: two installments: 50% upon project start, 50% upon completion
changes.new_snippet: three installments: 40% upon project start, 40% upon milestone completion, 20% upon final delivery

changes.description: Project timeline extended from 8 to 10 weeks
IP ownership clause refined from remain to become property
Source code repository provision added to IP terms
changes.new_snippet: Source code will be provided in a private repository
